pages.text: In my experimenting I have made an interesting discovery. Wrapping some redstone inlay around a block of soulium creates a rather simple mechanism called a soul checker.$(br2)This block, when placed, can be given someones name. Upon doing so, it will output a redstone signal if they are online.
I have yet to come up with any uses for this yet, but I'm sure something will come to mind eventually.
